casebody.data:
RIBELIN
v.
CREEL. No. 112A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 14, 2015. Robert L. Inge, Salisbury, Attorney at Law, for Creel, Phillip Ray. Phillip Creel, for Creel, Phillip Ray. Arlaine Rockey, Marshall, Attorney at Law, for Ribelin, Dana Marie (fka Creel). Mr. Kip David Nelson, Greensboro, Attorney at Law, for Creel, Phillip Ray.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 14th of September 2015 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of September 2015."
